201.description: successful creation of an SM context

Location.description: Contains the URI of the newly created resource, according to the structure: {apiRoot}/nsmf-pdusession/<apiVersion>/sm-contexts/{smContextRef}

400.description: unsuccessful creation of an SM context - bad request

403.description: unsuccessful creation of an SM context - forbidden

404.description: unsuccessful creation of an SM context - not found

500.description: unsuccessful creation of an SM context - internal server error

502.description: unsuccessful creation of an SM context â€“ Bad Gateway

503.description: unsuccessful creation of an SM context - service unavailable

504.description: unsuccessful creation of an SM context - gateway timeout

200.description: successful retrieval of an SM context
successful update of an SM context with content in the response

204.description: successful update of an SM context without content in the response

400.description: unsuccessful update of an SM context - bad request

403.description: unsuccessful update of an SM context - forbidden

404.description: unsuccessful update of an SM context - not found

500.description: unsuccessful update of an SM context - Internal server error

502.description: unsuccessful update of an SM context â€“ Bad Gateway

503.description: unsuccessful update of an SM context - Service Unavailable

504.description: unsuccessful update of an SM context - gateway timeout

200.description: successful release of a PDU session with content in the response

204.description: successful release of an SM context without content in the response

201.description: successful creation of a PDU session

Location.description: Contains the URI of the newly created resource, according to the structure: {apiRoot}/nsmf-pdusession/<apiVersion>/pdu-sessions/{pduSessionRef}

200.description: successful update of a PDU session with content in the response

204.description: successful update of a PDU session without content in the response

200.description: successful release of a PDU session with content in the response

204.description: successful release of a PDU session
